actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Congratulating Mr. Kermit Cintron on the successful defense of his IBF welterweight title on Saturday, 14, 2007, and for his continued success in and out of the ring.

summary.text: Congratulates Kermit Cintron, IBF welterweight champion, for his accomplishment. Thanks him for being a role model and an inspiration.

titles.title: Congratulating Mr. Kermit Cintron on the successful defense of his IBF welterweight title on Saturday, 14, 2007, and for his continued success in and out of the ring.
